# HotCRM Agent Command Center

This folder contains the **Knowledge Base** and **Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)** for the AI Agents developing HotCRM.

## ðŸ§  Expert Instruction Sets
When asking an AI to perform a role, refer it to these instruction files:

- **[Architect Guidelines](instructions/architect.md)**: System design, package structure, and dependency rules.
- **[Metadata Specialist](instructions/metadata.md)**: Creating Objects, Fields, and Relationships (`.object.ts`).
- **[Logic Engineer](instructions/logic.md)**: Writing Triggers, Hooks, and Actions (`.hook.ts`, `.action.ts`).
- **[UI Designer](instructions/ui.md)**: Building Pages, Views, and Dashboards (`.page.ts`).
